snippet: The Ford Fusion and Honda Accord, mainstream, top-selling cars, are already available as hybrids, but now they also come as premium-priced plug-in models.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2014 Honda Accord plug-in and 2013 Ford Fusion Energi.
lead_paragraph: The Ford Fusion and Honda Accord, mainstream, top-selling cars, are already available as hybrids, but now they also come as premium-priced plug-in models.

headline.seo: Aiming for the Hybrid’s Sweet Spot
